title: Savage eSports Academy Looking for Players (Gold-Plat)
body:
Savage eSports are a Diamond/Challenger player team that are currently looking for players to fill our new Academy team.

The Academy team will serve as a training ground for bringing up lower elo players so they can have a chance to make it to the big league (Main team)

We are searching for

TOP
JUNGLE
MID
ADC
SUPPORT

Strictly no trolls, if I deem you has immature you will not be selected.

Age Limit is 18.

Application template
____
IGN: Nestay
Age: 18
Location: Perth
Role: ADC
Reason for joining: Want to gain experience in the competitive scene.
____

Thanks for taking your time to read and fill out an application!

replies.body:
IGN: whiepumah

Age: 21

Location: Sydney

Role: ADC/ALL

Reason for joining:  Looking to play at a professional level with a serious team dedicated on improving and being the best.

IGN: The Copy Cat

Age: 20

Location: Warwick

Role: ADC

Reason for joining: Never been able to form a serious team that plays consistently and would like the experience of a more competitive scene

IGN: Kikkoo
Age: 18
Location: Melbourne
Role: Support (can play all)
Reason for joining: Want to find a actually team in which can be taking a bit more serious and experience

Note: The Copy Cat that is in the posts and myself want to apply together if possible as we have amazing bot synergy :)

IGN: Entiro  
Age: 18
Location: Melbourne
Role: ADC
Rank:  Plat 2 77LP
Reason for joining: Played on teams for a bit over a year and want to gain more competitive experience, have fun, and expand my strategic knowledge of the game.

IGN: CoduxDKO
Age: 18
Location: NZ
Role: Support Main, Top Secondary
Reason for joining: Team environment (Competitive) + Stress relief during Uni.
You silly little virgin why would you post this.... Couldn't even hold a strong team. Biggest troll ever. Have fun getting a team cutie

> [{quoted}](name=MrSlayerNN,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=wMTPijls,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-03-09T02:14:10.242+0000)
>
> You silly little virgin why would you post this.... Couldn't even hold a strong team. Biggest troll ever. Have fun getting a team cutie

Lol this cockroach, are you obsessed with me or something, I think stalking me on the forums is a little bit weird kid.

I'll bite.

IGN: Jaraxxus
Age:19
Location: Melbourne
Roles: Top
Reason For Joining: Have been looking for 4 other people to play with a while, I enjoy the team environment.

IGN: Beausen
Age: 19
Location: Brisbane
Role: Support
Reason for joining: i want to play on a serious team that is looking for dedicated players that will slowly improve an grow into something big. i do want to gain more experience of the competitive scene an hopefully go into OPL

IGN: Blàçk Frôst
Age: 20
Location: Melbourne
Role: Jungle, Top, Support
Reason for joining: wanting to experience team play and learn meta mechanics, plus to have a fun time with new people, willing to learn new champions, just looking for a new experience

IGN: ClouDy Days
Age: 18
Location: Sydney
Role: Mid/Top
Reason for joining: Searching for a serious team that wants to improve as a unit and individually, while trying their skills at tournaments and giving the ranked ladder a real run for its money.

IGN: Vaniila Magik (note 2 i's)
Age: 20
Location: NZ
Role: JG
Reason for joining: play in a team where everyone has a common goal to win and improve & working together as a team

IGN: Commando
Age: 16 Nearly 17
Location: New Zealand
Role: Highly pref ADC. But could support
Reason for joining: Want to be playing competitively in an active team and interested in progressing to higher level teams. Rank D4 currently, peaked D1 Season 4.

IGN: Istezz
Age: 17 (18 this may)
Location: Melbourne
Role: Mid or Adc
Reason for joining: Wanting to improve my overall game and play in a team environment with people around the same skill level as me.

IGN: Best Viktor AU
Age: 18
Location: Perth

Reason: Want to get better at the game in general.
Edit: and also play with people with the same goal of getting better.

I'm busy for the next couple days just add me and when I'm free we can talk.

IGN: CyanPhoenix
Age: 18
Location: Melbourne
Role: ADC
Reason for joining: would like to get experience with a serious ranked team and get better personally.

IGN: vSkylar
Age: 18
Location: Melbourne
Role: Any role, best adc.
Reason for joining: I love playing for rank 5's and found that this is a good opportunity to play and improve my skills.

(I know this is Gold+ but I was gold 1 before reset and after provisionals I havent taken it seriously. I will begin to concentrate and climb if it will make you consider me. Currently high silver.)
